name: cc10x
description: Intelligent orchestration system combining commands, sub-agents, and skills for 10x developer productivity. Features progressive loading (93% token savings), auto-healing context, multi-dimensional code review, systematic debugging (LOG FIRST pattern), and strict TDD enforcement.

commands.name: feature-build
commands.description: Complete 5-phase feature development workflow with TDD enforcement

commands.name: bug-fix
commands.description: Lightweight 5-phase debugging workflow with progressive context loading

commands.name: review
commands.description: Multi-dimensional code review (security, quality, performance, UX, accessibility)
